idea-plugin.name: swagger-annotation-tool
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin can (1) help you transform comment(include // or /** */) to springfox annotation.if there is no any comment, it can automatic add annotation by translating the filed name,so you'd better take a canonical name.And You can custom english mapping to chinese by yourself
(2) generate object setter function
Springfox-swagger Tool (springfox-Swagger Tool) In the model, the interface on the field is generally relatively few, I personally do not feel the need to automatically generate. Next,it will change the "swagger-tool" position，it will generate by Alt+Enter(the same with setter/getter)
usage: right click,choose "swagger-tool",then choose the transform method.
功能、使用方法：
只有在java文件中swagger-tool才可用。右键swagger-tool，选择转换方式、一键生成set实现
  • 转换不翻译：如果有注释，直接采用注释，没有注释则选用自定义的配置，如果自定义没有就不生成注解
  • 转换翻译：如果有自定义转换配置，则采用自定义的，没有就自定义就直接采用注释，没有注释则翻译后生成注释
  • 生成set实现: 自动生成object的set实现
